hotelWelcome.welcomeTitle: THE TAILOR ART HOTEL IN TEL AVIV
hotelWelcome.welcomeText: Experience the charm and elegance of a <0>Tailored</0> visit. Indulge in luxury, comfort, and breathtaking views. Enjoy our exclusive offers and make unforgettable memories. Unwind in style — from plush suites to serene rooftop lounges, every space invites relaxation. Savor gourmet cuisine curated by world-class chefs, paired with fine wines and unforgettable ambiance. Rejuvenate your senses at our exclusive spa, where tranquility meets indulgence. Celebrate life’s moments with bespoke events, curated experiences, and personalized service that feels like home. Whether you're here for a romantic escape, a business retreat, or a weekend of discovery, The Tailor Hotel promises more than a stay — it offers a story worth telling.

accessibilityPage.introText: Tailor Hotel is committed to providing respectful, inclusive, and accessible service to all guests. In accordance with the Equal Rights for People with Disabilities Law (1998), we continuously invest in making our facilities and services accessible.
buildingFeatures: Designated handicapped parking spaces near the entrance
Accessible reception desk and service counters
Clear signage for navigation and identification
Service animals are welcome throughout the property
Staff assistance available for form completion and guidance

features.keyboardNavigationContent: All menus, links, and form controls are reachable via Tab, Shift+Tab, Enter; plus a “Skip to Content” link at the top of each page.
features.semanticHtmlContent: Proper use of <nav>, <main>, <header>, landmarks, and aria-labels/roles to describe interactive components.
features.altTextContent: Meaningful alt attributes on images; captions for videos; transcripts for audio.
features.contrastContent: Contrast ratio ≥ 4.5:1; supports zoom up to 200% without loss of content.
features.responsiveContent: Flexible grid and breakpoints ensure readability on all screen sizes.
features.formLabelsContent: Each input has an associated <label>; errors announced via aria-live regions with clear fix instructions.

accessibilityPage.contactText: If you experience any barrier or issue, please email us at
accessibilityPage.contactFollowUp: — we’ll do our best to help or provide you an alternative format.

termsPage.introText: These Terms & Conditions govern your use of Tailor Hotel’s website and services. By accessing or booking with us, you agree to the following terms:

sections.title: Reservations & Payments
items: All reservations are subject to availability and confirmation.
Payment must be completed prior to check-in unless otherwise agreed.
Cancellation policies vary by rate and season.

sections.title: Guest Responsibilities
items: Guests must comply with hotel rules and respect other guests.
Damage to property may result in additional charges.

sections.title: Privacy & Data
sections.paragraph: We respect your privacy. Personal data collected during booking is handled in accordance with our privacy policy.

privacyPage.introText: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when you visit our website. By using our site, you agree to the practices described below, in accordance with GDPR and CCPA regulations.

sections.title: Data Collection
items: We collect non-personal data such as browser type, device info, and pages visited to improve site performance.
Personal data (e.g., name, email) is only collected when you voluntarily submit it via forms or account registration.
We do not collect sensitive personal data unless explicitly required and consented to.

sections.title: Legal Basis for Processing
items: We process personal data based on your consent, contractual necessity, legal obligations, or legitimate interests.
You may withdraw your consent at any time without affecting the lawfulness of prior processing.

sections.title: Cookies & Tracking
items: We use cookies to remember preferences, analyze traffic, and improve user experience.
Google Analytics tracks usage patterns anonymously.
Meta Pixel helps us measure ad performance and retarget visitors.
Tracking scripts are only activated after you accept cookies via our cookie drawer.

sections.title: Third-Party Services
items: We use Google and Meta platforms for analytics and advertising insights.
These services may store cookies or use similar technologies on your device.
We do not sell personal data. We only share data when legally required or with your explicit consent.

sections.title: International Data Transfers
items: Your data may be transferred to and processed in countries outside your jurisdiction.
We implement appropriate safeguards to ensure your data is protected in accordance with applicable laws.

sections.title: Data Retention
items: We retain personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes described or as required by law.
Retention periods vary depending on the nature of the data and legal obligations.

sections.title: Your Rights
items: You have the right to access, correct, delete, or restrict your personal data.
You may request data portability or object to certain types of processing.
California residents may opt out of the sale of personal information.
To exercise these rights, contact us at: privacy@yourdomain.com

sections.title: User Control
items: You can accept or decline cookies via the cookie drawer on our site.
Declining cookies disables tracking scripts and analytics tools.
You may request deletion of any personal data you’ve submitted via contact forms.

sections.title: Policy Updates
items: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Changes will be posted on this page with a revised date.
We encourage you to review this policy regularly to stay informed.
